brewery.brewery_description:
Brookfield Drinks is an exciting company specialising in the sales and marketing of alcoholic drinks in the UK off-trade and on-trade markets. Headed by Nigel McNally, the team has over 50 yearsâ€™ experience of specialist marketing and sales of drinks brands.

All of our brands fulfil the needs of consumers and the trade alike and offer differentiation from competitors. Our purpose is to nurture and develop these brands into key players within the market. Our portfolio consists of a variety of brands across beer and cider; although we are always on the lookout for new and innovative brands across all alcoholic and soft drink categories. Our brands have also been extended, with new variants recently being introduced to the market.

After a long day, what better way to kick back than with a crisp and refreshing lager? You're already feeling more relaxed, arenâ€™t you?. Thatâ€™s 75 different Lagers! Try 5 more for Level 16!

beer.beer_description:
This award-winning beer is the embodiment of the validity and integrity of the Holy Brewing Method our 9% abv been recognised receiving a gold medal from the 2015 Monde Selection Awards International Institute for Quality Selections

Kestrel Super Premium lager is now also available in an 8% variant

Appearance Honey-hued polished gold and ephemeral white foam create an intriguing spectacle

Aroma A perfumed sweetness and oaked spirit nose indicate something special to be discovered in this handsome liquid

Flavour Sweet toffee and honeyed twist turns and loops combine with a concentrated wine-like fruitiness feisty light rum swirls of malt and decidedly ripe dessert apple richness

Mouthfeel and finish Powerfully spirited and a juicy spice

items.checkin_comment: Oooh thatâ€™s very rich. Great whisky flavours. Bit of sourness but nice

beer.beer_description: Porter infused with Whisky.

items.checkin_comment: Initial notes of whisky develop into treacle which produces both a mildly bitter and toasty flavour. Body is a bit on the thin side, but for a company that mostly seems to produce lagers, this was a nice surprise.

beer.beer_description: Porter infused with Whisky.

beer.beer_description: Diamond White is the original premium packaged cider. This iconic brand was acquired by Brookfield Drinks in 2013. Highly recognisable and still coveted in today's market, the brand is going from strength to strength. Our cider brand successes continue to grow, with IRI Worldwide (Mat volume to 21.06.15) statistics recently revealing that our volumes make us the 3rd largest canned cider supplier in the UK Symbol and Independent convenience retailers.

items.badge_description: Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!
It takes the perfect amount of light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now itâ€™s time to drink it! Thatâ€™s 20 check-ins with a photo.

beer.beer_description:
This award-winning beer is the embodiment of the validity and integrity of the Holy Brewing Method our 9% abv been recognised receiving a gold medal from the 2015 Monde Selection Awards International Institute for Quality Selections

Kestrel Super Premium lager is now also available in an 8% variant

Appearance Honey-hued polished gold and ephemeral white foam create an intriguing spectacle

Aroma A perfumed sweetness and oaked spirit nose indicate something special to be discovered in this handsome liquid

Flavour Sweet toffee and honeyed twist turns and loops combine with a concentrated wine-like fruitiness feisty light rum swirls of malt and decidedly ripe dessert apple richness

Mouthfeel and finish Powerfully spirited and a juicy spice
Brewed in Glasgow for Brookfield. Former Wm. Younger's (Scottish & Newcastle) brand, acquired by Brookfield from Wells & Young in 2013.

Lionheart is a new artisan premium ale from the Brookfield Brewing Company. Lionheart is brewed to the highest modern standards of purity and quality, but the unique, secret recipe we use draws on 12th Century sources to make a beer that Richard himself might have enjoyed. Incorporating Sweet Gale, Lionheart truly is a tribute to the history of a great nation and one of its greatest kings.

Diamond White is the original premium packaged cider. This iconic brand was acquired by Brookfield Drinks in 2013. Highly recognisable and still coveted in today's market, the brand is going from strength to strength. Our cider brand successes continue to grow, with IRI Worldwide (Mat volume to 21.06.15) statistics recently revealing that our volumes make us the 3rd largest canned cider supplier in the UK Symbol and Independent convenience retailers.

This new 7% variant complements our existing range offering our drinkers a mid-point, higher strength, premium, crafted product.

â€˜Higher abvâ€™s are often associated with premium products and Kestrel is no exception."

Nigel McNally 
Managing Director, Brookfield Drinks Ltd

Kestrel Extra Premium Lager has been launched in sustainable packaging, which is 100% recyclable thus decreasing landfill waste.

A resurrection of the fondly remembered Kestrel Pilsner beer of the 1980s and 90s, our contemporary Pilsner offers an easy-drinking, flavoursome choice.
Varied flavour sensations - fruit to spice to malt - are the undoubted strengths of this hard-working beer.

Appearance: A light gold radiance plus an extravagant pure white head are an engaging combination and quite hypnotic.

Aroma: A ripe apple sourness and soft hay delicacy are simply an invitation to delve further.

Flavour: Sweet kiwi fruit interplaying with hints of citrus-laced spirit, herbal notes, and drifting toffeeness produce an elaborate and fascinating grouping

Mouthfeel and finish: Softly textured with a sweetness that lingers pleasantly -and with some length- on the palate

Introducing Black Star, a dry amber cider available in a 500ml can. With a fruity character, Black Star is packed full of flavour and body. Available throughout the UK in local independent and convenience stores.
Triple filtered. Gluten free. Vegan friendly
Apple Yard, a premium English cider at 4.5% abv, expertly crafted, using British apples and oak vats for conditioning.
Porter infused with Whisky.
